select c.cate_no cateNo, p.problem_no problemNo, p.problem_title problemTitle, p.type type, to_char(p.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') regDate from problem p, category c where p.cate_no = c.cate_no and p.cate_no = #{cateNo} order by problem_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into problem values( seq_problem_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{type}, #{problemTitle}, #{content}, #{contentImage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description}, #{answer}, sysdate )
insert into choice values( SEQ_CHOICE.nextval, seq_problem_no.currval, #{choiceContent}, #{filepath}, #{orderNo} )
mapper.select: select cate_no cateNo, type type, problem_title problemTitle, content content, content_image contentImage, description description, answer answer from problem where problem_no = #{problemNo}
select choice_content choiceContent, attachment_file attachmentFile, order_no orderNo from choice where problem_no = #{problemNo} order by order_no
